pedarogy.title: Creativity & Innovation
pedarogy.description: Unleash your imagination! Create unique inventions, explore new ideas, and become a budding innovator.

pedarogy.title: Critical Thinking
pedarogy.description: Awaken your thinking! Analyze ideas, ask questions, and develop logical thinking to better understand the world around you.

pedarogy.title: Problem Solving
pedarogy.description: Face challenges! Find innovative solutions and learn how to overcome obstacles with creativity and strategy.

pedarogy.title: Adaptability & Autonomy
pedarogy.description: Be flexible and independent! Adapt to new situations and take control of your learning with confidence.

pedarogy.title: Collaboration & Communication
pedarogy.description: Learn with friends and share ideas! At Warshati, teamwork is key to achieving great things.

pedarogy.title: Scientific Mindset & Curiosity
pedarogy.description: Explore, test, and discover! Ask questions, experiment, and build an insatiable curiosity for the world around you.

pedarogy.title: Ethical Awareness
pedarogy.description: Use technology responsibly! Learn ethical values, online safety, and become a responsible digital citizen.

pedarogy.title: Entrepreneurial Spirit
pedarogy.description: Turn your ideas into action! Learn innovation, initiative, and develop an entrepreneurial mindset from a young age.

pedarogy.title: Digital Culture
pedarogy.description: Master the digital world! Understand technologies, protect your data, and use digital tools responsibly and creatively.

curricula.title: Smart Workshops Program

items.title: STEAM
items.description: A well-structured STEAM education program offers students hands-on, interdisciplinary learning experiences by meaningfully integrating science, technology, engineering, arts, and mathematics.

items.title: AI & ML
items.description: A structured program introduces students to Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) through age-appropriate, practical activities, encouraging problem-solving, creativity, and computational thinking.

items.title: Computational Thinking
items.description: A curriculum focused on software development and data science helps students strengthen their logical reasoning and algorithmic thinking skills, while nurturing creative and efficient problem analysis.

items.title: Coding (Text & Block)
items.description: A progressive coding program that combines visual block-based programming with traditional text-based languages. Students begin with block coding and gradually move toward writing actual code.

items.title: Information & Data
items.description: Learn to search for accurate information online, choose trustworthy sources, and organize digital content smartly. Discover how to safely find, store, and manage data.

items.title: Creating Digital Content
items.description: Learn how to design and edit digital content! Explore how to build on existing knowledge while respecting copyrights and licenses, and how to give clear instructions to computers.

items.title: Online Safety
items.description: Learn how to protect your devices, personal data, and privacy in the digital world. Discover how to safeguard your well-being while using technology, and understand how digital tools can promote inclusion and sustainability.

items.title: Connected & Collaborative
items.description: Engage, connect, and collaborate using digital tools while embracing cultural and generational diversity. Learn to manage your online identity and build a strong, positive digital presence.

curricula.text: The program spans a full academic year, structured around quarterly milestones.
